page.title: 08WORKING IN BALMEDIE
page.content: In Balmedie there are not a lot of jobs.Most of the people work in Aberdeen,and travel to their work every morning. Some people are employed at the Old Folks Home.25 people work there,including nurses and cooks etc.The White Horse INN employs 55 people including 4 cooks,3 cleaners and 2 managers.There is also the Mushroom Farm which employs 17 people.The local chip shop employs 4 people,and the Balmedie shop has 3 people working there.There is a butcher who employs 2 people.The local school employs 29 people including teachers ,cleaners and cooks.There are some people employed in the catching of salmon,and quite a few people are employed in the building site across from the school. .
